Summary: 4 Bright red/orange orbs, flew straight & disappeared
divs: sighting detailssitting with some friends at coffee when one of them facing me said "hey, what's that?" and pointed to something behind me. i turned around to see what was clearly a helicopter or airplane flying but surrounding it a little further in the distance were 4 "orbs", glowing orange\red. looked like they could have possibly been in a v formation, but not a part of one unit, and the angle at which we were looking at them made it also difficult to tell if there was a true formation in the flying pattern. the orbs did not hover but rather continued to move in a straight line and then one at a time each orb slowly dimmed out until none of them could be seen anymore. this happened in about a minute time span, maybe slightly more or less. nothing more was seen and the helicopter\airplane just continued on it's way. i was present during the first phoenix lights in az and saw them first hand. although these did not hover or seem to be in a clear flying formation, the color and shape seemed very similar to the first sighting in 1997. i am not a huge ufo person and i am not a person who would typically seek out this kind of site, however this is not the first time i have seen this in the last couple years and it frequently seems to be unreported, as if no one else saw it. so, i thought i would throw this out there and see if anyone else saw what i saw. i was at mcclintock and southern when it happened in tempe.
